about_the_game:
WARNO - Expansion Pass features the ultimate WARNO experience. With pre-orders of two major expansions and two Nemesis DLC, WARNO Gold is a deluxe bundle filled to the brim with extra content.

WARNO - Nemesis #1 - Air Assault (Releases Q3 2024)

Nemesis: Air Assault features the famous American U.S. 101st Airborne Division (Air Assault) and the hardy Afghanistan War veterans of the Soviet 56th Separate Air Assault Brigade. As the first Nemesis DLC for WARNO, it contains 2 new Divisions and several new units.

WARNO - Nemesis #2 (Releases Q4 2024)

The Nemesis DLC invites players to decide which pair of Divisions should come next. Each Nemesis DLC features 2 new Divisions and several new units. This Nemesis DLC will be voted on by the WARNO community at a future date.

WARNO - NORTHAG (Releases Q4 2024)

WARNO - NORTHAG brings World War III to the North German Plains, where the attacking Warsaw Pact needs to overcome the staunch defenses of NATO’s NORTHAG. Play 2 massive new Army General campaigns and 4 Operations while you command 10 new Divisions and units, including new nations Belgium, the Netherlands, and Poland.

WARNO - SOUTHAG (Releases 2025)

WARNO - SOUTHAG takes the action to southern West Germany, as NATO’s reconstituted SOUTHAG counter-attacks against the invading Warsaw Pact forces. Play 2 massive new Army General campaigns and 4 Operations while you command 10 new Divisions and units, including new nations Canada, Spain, and Czechoslovakia.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:

short_description: WARNO - Expansion Pass features the ultimate WARNO experience. With pre-orders of two major expansions and two Nemesis DLC, WARNO Gold is a deluxe bundle filled to the brim with extra content.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
